title: #282 – David Buss: Sex, Dating, Relationships, and Sex Differences
description: David Buss is an evolutionary psychologist at UT Austin. He is one of the founders of the field of evolutionary psychology. His current research is on sex differences in mate selection, mate attraction, infidelity, and the emotions of jealousy, lust, and love.
